question: Do breast and ovarian cancer risks among BRCA1 mutation carriers vary according to the mutationâ€™s location within the BRCA1 gene? Answer with Yes or No.

content.source_1: CONCLUSIONS AND RELEVANCE Breast and ovarian cancer risks varied by type and location of BRCA1/2 mutations.
content.source_2: Mutations predicted to trigger nonsense-mediated decay were not linked to differing breast or ovarian cancer risks among BRCA1 carriers, and age at breast cancer diagnosis was similar regardless of mutation location.
content.source_3: Mutations conferring nonsense-mediated decay were associated with differential breast or ovarian cancer risks and an earlier age of breast cancer diagnosis for both BRCA1 and BRCA2 mutation carriers.
content.source_4: Breast and ovarian cancer risks did not vary by the location of BRCA1 mutations; observed differences were attributable solely to mutation type.
